thread.title: Emma Watson Sings 'Belle' In New 'Beauty And The Beast' Teaser (VIDEO)
thread.title_full: Emma Watson Sings 'Belle' In New 'Beauty And The Beast' Teaser (VIDEO)

title: Emma Watson Sings 'Belle' In New 'Beauty And The Beast' Teaser (VIDEO)
text:
Emma Watson Sings 'Belle' In New 'Beauty And The Beast' Teaser (VIDEO) 1 hour ago 
We're officially less than a month away from Disney's live-action rendition of Beauty and the Beast and the opening scene with Emma Watson as Belle has arrived.   "live", "id" : 4422, "name" : "Hit Nation", "description" : "All of Today's Biggest Hits" } } 
On Monday (February 20), Disney unleashed a 58-second teaser from the film, which introduces viewers to Belle and the rep that the soon-to-be princess has amongst the folks in town. Much like the original 1991 animated version, this sneak peek includes snarky villagers, freshly baked bread and a whole lot of "bonjours." 
In this week's EW cover story , Watson shared some insight on the project. "I was like, 'I have to tell this story. Oh my god if I don't do this, nothing else makes sense. [It] made me feel that I had something else to give and offer." 
Beauty and the Beast hits theaters nationwide on March 17. â€” Emma Watson (@EmmaWatson) February 16, 2017 
Photo: YouTube/Disney Movie Trailers
